text: 1:3 Matyu 28:17; Mak 16:12; Luk 24:36-49; Aposel 10:41; 1 Korin 15:5-7A faragha mɨzaziba inigha aremegha ua dɨkafi. Egha a tɨghar Godɨn Nguibamɨn mangasava amua uabɨ isa uan aposelbar aka. Egha a bizir avɨribar men akazɨ, me bar fo, a ua dɨkavigha iti. Ezɨ 40plan dughiaba, dughiar kamɨn aven dughiar avɨriba a uabɨ men akakaghava God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn gun me mɨgei.
